abstract.t: Today the IETF recommends, and in some places requires theimplementation of the U.S. Data Encryption Standard (DES). Thischoice was made a number of years ago with the assumption that DESrepresented an unbreakable cipher. Recent work has shown thisassumption to no longer be the case. Therefore this documentdiscusses what alternatives and directions are available to the IETF.
